title: Safety Valves and Safety Relief Valves
content:
Safety Valves and Safety Relief Valves

State Regulations
§ 14-9.4 - Safety valve requirements
§ 14-9.5 - Power actuated pressure relieving devices
§ 14-9.6 - Setting of safety valves and safety relief valves
§ 14-9.7 - Safety valve and safety relief valve testing and repairs
§ 14-9.8 - Stamping of valves
§ 14-9.9 - Valve capacity
§ 14-9.10 - Safety valve connections
§ 14-9.11 - Muffler on safety valve or safety relief valve
§ 14-9.12 - Blowdown adjustment
§ 14-9.13 - Safety valve construction and rating
§ 14-9.14 - Superheater safety valves
§ 14-9.15 - Outlet connections

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
